name: Create
description: Deploys Azure Search Datasource, Index, or Indexer from a JSON definition
author: Mikael Stadden

inputs.name: SearchServiceName
inputs.label: Search Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of your Azure Search Service

inputs.name: ApiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Search API Key that is used to create objects in Azure Search

inputs.name: SearchServiceApiVersion
inputs.label: Search Service API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Version of Azure Search to use when creating your object

inputs.name: SearchServiceObject
inputs.label: Type of Object to Deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose either an Azure Search Datasource, Index, or Indexer to deploy. This needs to match your JSON definition.

inputs.name: JsonPath
inputs.label: Azure Search Object JSON File Path from Artifact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the JSON file from your artifact that defines your Azure Search Object

inputs.name: OverwriteExistingObject
inputs.label: Overwrite existing object if it exists?
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set, will delete an existing Azure Search object of the same name before creating the specified object.
